Not sure why this got moved to common.  I believe I have a fix for this problem though.  I'm going to target it for 3.0 M2.

Created an attachment (id=77398)
org.eclipse.wst.sse.ui.patch

The fix has to do with updating the projection updater in StructuredTextEditor when the input changes.  This will ensure the right content type's projection updater gets installed if the content type of the input happens to change.
fix released for this week's wtp 3.0 integration build.
